title: US nurse and child kidnapped in Haiti
description: An American nurse and her child have been kidnapped in Haiti, a Christian aid group said Saturday, July 29, 2023.

title: Women's Tour de France: Vollering lead with fog-bound victory
description: On Saturday, July 29, Demi Vollering emerged through the fog of the Col du Tourmalet, a stunning winner to take the queen stage and move into the yellow jersey.

title: On French Riviera, town dyes grass green to hide effects of drought
description: Attracting much attention on social media, the decision taken by the town of Mandelieu-la-Napoule has sparked confusion and criticism.

title: Roman Abramovich, from art lover to patron of Russian culture
description: 'Roman Abramovich, the most secretive of oligarchs' (6/6). Having become extremely wealthy, the businessman developed a taste for collecting art. But he also financed creative artists in Russia, even those highly critical of Putin's rule.

title: France suspends development, budget aid to Niger
description: The decision follows a coup aimed at overthrowing Niger's president Mohamed Bazoum. The African country is one of France's last allies in the Sahel.

title: Paris 2024: French official says not worried by lack of  air-con in Olympic village
description: André-Pierre Goubert, director of the Olympic pole of the French National Olympic and Sports Committee, says the temperature in the Olympic Village will remain conducive to a good recovery for the athletes.

title: All Blacks crush Wallabies 38-7 to retain Rugby Championship title
description: New Zealand came into the match as a massive favorite against Australia.

title: French economy holds up... for now
description: Driven by exports, GDP was up 0.5% in the second quarter, with inflation easing slightly.

title: Inside the creative battle that birthed Dungeons & Dragons
description: 'Dungeons & Dragons: The saga of a game' (2/6). Contrary to what Gary Gygax, the most famous of its inventors, would later have people believe, the creation of the first role-playing game was not a one-man affair. A feud even led to an acrimonious dispute over D&D's intellectual property.

title: Renard gives France victory over Brazil at Women's World Cup
description: Captain Wendy Renard's header seven minutes from time earned France a dramatic 2-1 win over Brazil at Brisbane's Lang Park on Saturday.

title: France's Grousset wins men's 100m butterfly world title
description: Maxime Grousset managed to finish ahead of Canada's Josh Liendo.

title: France relies on climate adaptation to retain influence in the Pacific
description: During a tour of Oceania, French President Emmanuel Macron stressed the 'independence' and 'sovereignty' of the territories he visited while asserting France's 'goal' was not to 'compete with China or the United States.'

title: Niger: 'The plan to overthrow Bazoum has long existed within the army'
description: General Tchiani knew he was threatened by the president, who wanted to reform the security apparatus, according to researcher Rahmane Idrissa.

title: With Niger coup, the West loses a crucial ally in the Sahel
description: For over 10 years, Niger has been a key partner for the United States and Europe, in particular France. The putsch against President Mohamed Bazoum could call the Western countries' intervention into question.

title: Russia raises conscription age from 27 to 30
description: The legislation approved by the Duma should allow for an additional 1.5 million recruits to be drafted and provides for tighter monitoring to prevent mass departures abroad.

title: Women's World Cup: French players are increasingly looking abroad
description: Eight of the 23 French players selected for the 2023 World Cup play for clubs outside France. This trend is accelerating, and could be a boon for the players in the French national team.

title: Helicopter crash pauses Australia-US military exercise, four missing
description: Defense officials announced a pause in the Talisman Sabre exercise, which also includes soldiers from Japan, France, Germany, and South Korea.

title: US announces $345 million military aid package for Taiwan
description: The goals are to help it counter China and to deter China from considering attacking, by providing Taipei enough weaponry that it would make the price of invasion too high.

title: 'X' logo installed atop Twitter building, leading to a permit violation investigation
description: The logo appeared after San Francisco police stopped workers on Monday from removing the brand's iconic bird and logo from the side of the building.
